Package test

Class CommonFunctions

java.lang.Object
test.CommonFunctions
public class CommonFunctions extends Object
This class will have common functions that are required for other classes and are called frequently
Author:
pc-fahad

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ArrayList<SurahBasmalah>
    getSurahBasmalahByPageId(int pageId)
    After we have run @extractBasmalahFromImagesToList we got a list of basmalah this will help later when we detect ayah images and find out their surah based on their location and the basmalah location from this list To Note: we have one Surah that do not have basmalah in it 'Al-tubah' so we inserted a fake location temp.add(new SurahBasmalah("{1,1}",187,1,9)); If a page has surah we have it's location if not we have an empty string
    static int
    getSurahNumberBasedOnBasmalah(int currentY, SurahBasmalah loc)
    This function will detect the Surah based on the basmalah location and the Y location of the Ayah this function is very important as some pages will have two or three Surahs on a single page So to find out which surah we compare the Y location of the ayah to the basmalah
    static boolean
    isBetween(int toCheck, int from, int to)
    This function will compare if a value is between two values we use this to detect for close pixels and remove them
    static ArrayList<String>
    orgnizingArrayByYandX(ArrayList<String> correctList)
    This function is also very important as the list after detection will have different values but we need them organized by Top to Bottom and Right to Left but detection is done by Left to Right.

      public CommonFunctions()

  • Method Details

    • getSurahBasmalahByPageId

      public static ArrayList<SurahBasmalah> getSurahBasmalahByPageId(int pageId)
      After we have run @extractBasmalahFromImagesToList we got a list of basmalah this will help later when we detect ayah images and find out their surah based on their location and the basmalah location from this list To Note: we have one Surah that do not have basmalah in it 'Al-tubah' so we inserted a fake location temp.add(new SurahBasmalah("{1,1}",187,1,9)); If a page has surah we have it's location if not we have an empty string
      Parameters:
      pageId - we should return the page that matches the id
      Returns:
      This will return a list of basmalah since some pages will have multiple basmalah locations

    • getSurahNumberBasedOnBasmalah

      public static int getSurahNumberBasedOnBasmalah(int currentY, SurahBasmalah loc)
      This function will detect the Surah based on the basmalah location and the Y location of the Ayah this function is very important as some pages will have two or three Surahs on a single page So to find out which surah we compare the Y location of the ayah to the basmalah
      Parameters:
      currentY - This will be the y location for the detected ayah we use Y not X as we check pages from top to Bottom
      loc - This is SurahBasmalah location that we have detected before
      Returns:
      if found we return the surah location if not we return 0 as this page doesn't have a basmalah

    • orgnizingArrayByYandX

      public static ArrayList<String> orgnizingArrayByYandX(ArrayList<String> correctList)
      This function is also very important as the list after detection will have different values but we need them organized by Top to Bottom and Right to Left but detection is done by Left to Right. Top to Bottom from 0 value we take the lowest as the lowest Y means this is the first line from top Right to Left we pick the largest X as the detection will be from left to right 0 so the bigger the x means this is start of The right page
      Parameters:
      correctList - this will take the list before ordering
      Returns:
      The list after ordering it from Top to bottom and Right to Left

    • isBetween

      public static boolean isBetween(int toCheck, int from, int to)
      This function will compare if a value is between two values we use this to detect for close pixels and remove them
      Parameters:
      toCheck - the value to compare
      from - From value
      to - To value
      Returns:
      true or false
